home.title: About Me
home.description: A cloud engineer with experience and a background in research and development.

experiences.content: Building resources on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud using Terraform. Developing cloud solutions.
Researched a hands-free operation interface app using facial feature point information.
Researched estimating human movement from sensor data using deep learning.
Track and field club. Participated in national triple jump competition in 3rd year of high school. Ranked around 30th nationally.

works.title: Work Experience & Projects
works.description: Introducing my work experience, university projects, and personal development projects.
employments: Experience in building and operating infrastructure in cloud environments such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.
Experience in building and managing environments using IaC (Infrastructure as Code) with Terraform.
Experience in designing, building, and operating CI/CD pipelines.
Experience in web application development using Python, TypeScript, Go, etc.
Experience in development and operation using container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
Experience in introducing and operating monitoring and log collection (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack).
students: Research and development of a non-contact operation interface using facial feature point information.
Research on estimating human behavior from sensor data using deep learning.
Experience in academic presentations and paper writing.
hobbies: Design, development, and release of personal development apps.

certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer Associate (AZ-500)
Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions (AZ-400)
Microsoft Certified: Azure Virtual Desktop Specialty (AZ-140)
Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate (AI-102)
Microsoft Certified: Azure Cosmos DB Developer Specialty (DP-420)
